title: That Which Is Not | DELETIONS Artwork
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:minimalist-bhl]]

[[module css]]
a#history-button, a#files-button {
display: none;
}
[[/module]]

[[module CSS]]
:root {
     --header-title: "DEPARTMENT OF DELETIONS";
     --header-subtitle: "Forever Bound to NULL";
     --lgurl: url('');
}
[[/module]]

[[>]]
[[module RATE]]
[[/>]]

[[=]]
++++ There is certain comfort in nonexistence. 
[[/=]]

[[=]]
[[collapsible show="N/A" hide="N/A"]]
[[/=]]

[[include component:image-block
| name=https://i.imgur.com/UpFxJT2.jpg
| align=center
| width=600px
| height=600px
| caption=**"What do you call something that doesn't not exist, but also can't be labelled as existent?"**
]]

[[/collapsible]]

------

@@ @@
@@ @@

[[=]]
++++ There are no expectations. Zero pressure. Every anxiety in the world, every terror of mortality, all of them drift away. A dreamless sleep. 
[[/=]]

[[=]]
[[collapsible show="N/A" hide="N/A"]]
[[/=]]

[[include component:image-block
| name=https://i.imgur.com/LWgzmQU_d.webp?maxwidth=760&fidelity=grand
| align=center
| width=600px
| height=600px
| caption=**"It's my fucking hand! It's made of… candlewax… It even has a wick running through the middle finger. God. I can't feel it. What is going on!?"**
]]

[[/collapsible]]

------

@@ @@
@@ @@

[[=]]
++++ It's hard to describe, since it never really happened. You can't experience nothing when you aren't anything yourself. 
[[/=]]

[[=]]
[[collapsible show="N/A" hide="N/A"]]
[[/=]]

[[include component:image-block
| name=https://i.imgur.com/hIF5dYg_d.webp?maxwidth=760&fidelity=grand
| align=center
| width=600px
| height=600px
| caption=**"Well, that's exactly why I've arranged this meeting; As you can probably tell, you exist again, which means we have a new assignment."**
]]

[[/collapsible]]

------

@@ @@
@@ @@

[[=]]
++++ But that doesn't make it any less comfortable. 
[[/=]]

[[=]]
[[collapsible show="N/A" hide="N/A"]]
[[/=]]

[[include component:image-block
| name=https://i.imgur.com/VlSz5zv_d.webp?maxwidth=760&fidelity=grand
| align=center
| width=600px
| height=600px
| caption=**"That's what we all thought, anyway. Until we realized there were turbines growing under the turbines, and that the world was boiling us alive twice as quickly."**
]]

[[/collapsible]]

------

@@ @@
@@ @@

[[=]]
++++ And then you get pulled back into reality.  
[[/=]]

[[=]]
[[collapsible show="N/A" hide="N/A"]]
[[/=]]

[[include component:image-block
| name=https://i.imgur.com/CJtjHzY_d.webp?maxwidth=760&fidelity=grand
| align=center
| width=600px
| height=600px
| caption=**"Yes, I see you there. Reading my words. Viewing my face. In every moment, I can see you."**
]]

[[/collapsible]]


@@ @@
@@ @@

[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6183|SCP-6183: B L A C K B O X]]] by [[*user Billith]], [[*user MontagueETC]], and [[*user Liryn]]

[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-7912|SCP-7912: I N T E R I O R]]] by [[*user Billith]]

[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6768|SCP-6768: C U R R E N T]]] by [[*user Billith]], [[*user Doctor Cimmerian]], and [[*user Dr Shoulder]]

[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-7549|SCP-7549: C A C H E]]] by [[*user Billith]]
